p: Ethanolic extract of Cullen corylifolium (L.) Medik. seeds showed an important inhibitory effect of SARS-CoV PLpro with an IC 50 of 15 µg/ml. Furthermore, six flavonoids present in the extract (Bavachinin, neobavaisoflavone, isobavachalcone,40 –O-methylbavachalcone, psoralidin, and corylifol A) inhibited SARS-CoV PLpro activity in a dose-dependent manner with IC 50 estimated to be 4.2–38.4 µM. The highest inhibitory effect was exerted by psoralidin (IC 50 = 4.2 ± 1.0 µM) and isobavachalcone (IC 50 = 7.3 ± 0.8 µM) ( Kim et al., 2014).
